sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHWARTENBURG, a town and caſtle of Germany, and circle of Upper Saxony, in the landgravate of Thuringia, and capital of a county of the ſame name belonging to a prince of the houſe of Saxony. It is ſeated on the river Schwartz, 20 miles ſouth-eaſt of Erford, and 35 north of Cullembach. E. Long. 11. 27. N. Lat. 50. 45.
